bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
Please update to a newer snapshot to include https://github.com/klauspost/crc32/commit/89873b58f19dea110d68c709d6dd7928601ffb18 that will allow build on s390x
Version-Release number of selected component (if applicable): golang-github-klauspost-crc32-0-0.2.gita3b15ae.fc25
This bug appears to have been reported against 'rawhide' during the Fedora 25 development cycle. Changing version to '25'.
golang-github-klauspost-crc32-0-0.3.git89873b5.fc23 has been submitted as an update to Fedora 23. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2016-9de2659ca8
